items.title: Strategist Tom Lee says the S&P 500 can reach as high as 7,000 — if two conditions are met
items.description: Strategist Tom Lee is raising his sights on the stock market — if two key conditions are met.

items.title: EVs put Ford and other automakers at a crossroads: Who will innovate the assembly line of the future?
items.description: There’s a race to build more vehicles more efficiently, with Ford, Tesla and others trying to revamp the way cars are made

items.title: My stepmother’s lawyer called us ‘greedy’ for fighting for our father’s estate. When will it end?
items.description: “During the marriage, all his real estate ended up in trusts he didn’t fully understand.”

items.title: ‘I consider myself pretty lucky’: I’m 65 with $4 million. Do I buy an annuity to protect against Social Security’s demise?
items.description: “Do I pay off my 4% mortgages instead of investing my cash?”

items.title: A stablecoin boom will force a return to dollar dominance — but not just yet, this strategist says
items.description: Michael Kelly of PineBridge says the dollar will be choppy until the Fed rate cycle wraps up.
